catalogTargets.description: List of nested AWS Glue Data Catalog target arguments. See Catalog Target below.

classifiers.description: List of custom classifiers. By default, all AWS classifiers are included in a crawl, but these custom classifiers always override the default classifiers for a given classification.

configuration.description: JSON string of configuration information. For more details see [Setting Crawler Configuration Options](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/glue/latest/dg/crawler-configuration.html).

databaseName.description: Glue database where results are written.

deltaTargets.description: List of nested Delta Lake target arguments. See Delta Target below.

dynamodbTargets.description: List of nested DynamoDB target arguments. See Dynamodb Target below.

hudiTargets.description: List of nested Hudi target arguments. See Iceberg Target below.

icebergTargets.description: List of nested Iceberg target arguments. See Iceberg Target below.

jdbcTargets.description: List of nested JDBC target arguments. See JDBC Target below.

lakeFormationConfiguration.description: Specifies Lake Formation configuration settings for the crawler. See Lake Formation Configuration below.

lineageConfiguration.description: Specifies data lineage configuration settings for the crawler. See Lineage Configuration below.

mongodbTargets.description: List of nested MongoDB target arguments. See MongoDB Target below.

recrawlPolicy.description: A policy that specifies whether to crawl the entire dataset again, or to crawl only folders that were added since the last crawler run.. See Recrawl Policy below.

role.description: The IAM role friendly name (including path without leading slash), or ARN of an IAM role, used by the crawler to access other resources.

s3Targets.description: List of nested Amazon S3 target arguments. See S3 Target below.

schedule.description: A cron expression used to specify the schedule. For more information, see [Time-Based Schedules for Jobs and Crawlers](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/glue/latest/dg/monitor-data-warehouse-schedule.html). For example, to run something every day at 12:15 UTC, you would specify: `cron(15 12 * * ? *)`.

schemaChangePolicy.description: Policy for the crawler's update and deletion behavior. See Schema Change Policy below.

securityConfiguration.description: The name of Security Configuration to be used by the crawler

tablePrefix.description: The table prefix used for catalog tables that are created.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
